title: Questions for the Movie Answer Man
description: What was in the briefcase in Pulp Fiction ? Why don't movie actors wear seat belts? Was Fargo really based on a true story? Pulitzer Prize-winning film critic Roger Ebert answers these and hundreds more. Using wit, insight, and dozens of other experts, he resolves some of the most common questions about the moviesand some of the most bizarre.
author: Roger Ebert
